text_input: Usay di best tem fo plant mangro?
output: Di best tem fo plant mangro na dry season en rainy season junction, so di tri go get bɔku wɛta fo grow fayn.

text_input: Usay di best gron fo grow cassava?
output: Cassava lek sandy en loamy gron we no too get bɔku wata en no too hard.

text_input: How fo prɛvɛnt pest pan mi rice farm?
output: Fo prɛvɛnt pest dem, you fo clean di farm well, use organic pesticide, en plant resistant rice variety.

text_input: Wetin fo do if mi mango dem nor di ripe good?
output: Check if di mangro dem bin pick too early. Lef dem pan tri lɛngka, or wrap dem wit banana leaf fo ripen fayn.

text_input: Usay di best tem fo harvest mangro?
output: Di best tem fo harvest mangro na wɛn di skin don begin change color en e di pull easy from di tri.

text_input: How fo improve soil fertility?
output: You fo use compost, rotate crop dem, en avoid too much chemical fertilizer fo keep di gron healthy.

text_input: Wetin fo do if mi gron dry en no get wɛta?
output: You fo practice mulching, dig small trench fo keep wata, en use drought-resistant crop dem.

text_input: How fo stop cut-cut grass (grasscutter) pan mi farm?
output: Build fence, set trap dem, en keep di area clean so di animal dem nor go get place fo hide.

text_input: Wetin na organic farming?
output: Organic farming na wɛ wi nor di use chemical pesticide en fertilizer, but wi di use natural way dem fo grow food.

text_input: How fo store harvested corn fayn?
output: Dry di corn well, keep am na dry place, en use airtight container fo prɛvɛnt insect dem.

text_input: Wetin fo do if mi cassava nor di grow big?
output: Make sure say di gron loose en get bɛtɛ drainage. Use improved cassava cuttings en avoid planting dem too close.

text_input: How fo grow bɔku tomato?
output: Plant tomato na well-drained loamy gron, give dem bɔku sunlight, en use organic compost fo bɛtɛ yield.

text_input: Wetin fo do if grasshopper dem di eat mi crop dem?
output: Use neem leaf spray, encourage bird dem fo eat di insect dem, en hand-pick di grasshopper dem early morning.

text_input: How fo plant groundnut?
output: Plant groundnut na sandy loam gron, space dem well, en plant during early rainy season fo bɛtɛ result.

text_input: Wetin fo do if mi cocoa di get black pod disease?
output: Prune di tree, remove infected pod dem quick, en use copper-based fungicide fo prɛvɛnt spread.

text_input: How fo control weed pan mi farm?
output: Use mulch, weed by hand or use hoe early before dem grow big, en rotate crop dem.

text_input: Wetin na di best way fo store potato?
output: Store potato na cool, dry place we get good ventilation. Nor wash dem before storage.

text_input: How fo plant banana?
output: Plant banana sucker na moist gron, space dem well, en water dem bɔku but nor make e soak.

text_input: How climate change di affect farming?
output: Climate change di cause drought, heavy rain, en new pest dem. Farmers fo use drought-resistant crops en adapt farming practices.

text_input: Wetin fo do if mi pepper plant di dry fast?
output: Mulch around di plant fo keep moisture, water dem early morning or late evening, en avoid over-exposure to sun.

text_input: How fo bɛtɛ yield fo okro?
output: Plant okro na well-drained soil, space dem good, en harvest dem early so new pod go grow.

text_input: How fo make compost fo mi farm?
output: Mix dry leaf, green plant waste, en animal manure inside one pile, turn am every two weeks until e rot good.

text_input: Wetin na di best way fo store palm oil?
output: Store palm oil na cool, dry place inside airtight container. Avoid direct sunlight fo prɛvɛnt spoilage.

text_input: How fo grow pineapple?
output: Plant pineapple sucker na sandy loamy gron, give dem bɔku sunlight, en nor water dem too much.

text_input: How fo protect mi rice farm from birds?
output: Use scarecrow, make noise with tin can dem, en cover di rice with net fo protect am.

text_input: Wetin na di sign say corn don ready fo harvest?
output: Di husk go begin dry, di silk go turn brown, en if you press di corn grain e go hard small.

text_input: How fo bɛtɛ di quality of palm kernel oil?
output: Use fresh palm kernel, dry dem well before processing, en avoid contamination with dirt.

text_input: How fo prɛvɛnt soil erosion pan mi farm?
output: Use contour farming, plant grass strip dem, en nor over-cultivate di land.

text_input: How fo preserve mango fo long tem?
output: Dry di mango slice dem, or store fresh one inside fridge inside plastic container.

text_input: How fo prepare gron before planting?
output: Clear di bush, dig di gron, mix am wit compost, en level am good before you plant.

text_input: Wetin fo use fo make di gron rich?
output: Use animal manure, compost, en green leaf mulch fo add nutrient na di gron.

text_input: How fo know if gron dry too much?
output: If di gron crack, plant dem nor di grow well, en e di feel too hard wɛn you dig, den e dry.

text_input: How fo water plant during dry season?
output: Use drip irrigation, water di plant early morning en late evening, en use mulch fo keep moisture.

text_input: Wetin na di best crop fo plant during rainy season?
output: Rice, corn, cassava, groundnut, en okro dem grow fine na rainy season.

text_input: How fo stop rat pan mi farm?
output: Use trap, keep di farm clean, en plant mint or other strong smell plant dem we rat nor lek.

text_input: How fo take care of goat dem?
output: Give dem dry place fo sleep, feed dem wit grass en maize, en give dem clean wata all tem.

text_input: How fo prevent cow dem from sick?
output: Give dem vaccination, keep dem inside clean place, en avoid too much insect na di area.

text_input: Wetin fo do if mi plant dem di get yellow leaf?
output: Check if e lack nitrogen, add organic fertilizer, en nor over-water di plant dem.

text_input: How fo grow coconut?
output: Plant coconut seedling na sandy soil, keep am na place we get bɔku sunlight, en water am well.

text_input: Wetin fo do if mi palm tree nor di bear fruit?
output: Check if e get enough sunlight, clear bush around am, en add potassium-rich fertilizer.

text_input: How fo plant sugarcane?
output: Cut healthy sugarcane stem, plant am inside moist gron, en water am regular.

text_input: How fo protect mi cassava from pest?
output: Plant resistant variety, use neem leaf spray, en remove infected leaf dem quick.

text_input: Wetin fo do if mi chicken dem di die plenty?
output: Check if dem get enough clean wata, good food, en vaccinate dem against common disease dem.

text_input: How fo store beans fo long tem?
output: Dry di beans well, store dem na airtight container, en add dry pepper fo keep insect away.

text_input: Wetin na di best crop fo plant fo dry season?
output: Pepper, tomato, onion, en cassava kin grow fine if dem get enough wata.

text_input: How fo prepare pepper seed before planting?
output: Soak di seed dem na warm wata fo some hour, dry dem, en plant dem na nursery before transplant.

text_input: How fo store dry fish fo long tem?
output: Keep am inside dry place, use salt fo preserve am, en store am inside airtight container.

text_input: How fo bɛtɛ di yield fo yam?
output: Plant big healthy yam seed, keep di gron loose, en cover di root good wit soil.

text_input: Wetin fo do if mi cocoa farm di get too much insect?
output: Use organic insecticide, remove damaged pod dem, en plant insect-repellent tree dem near di farm.

text_input: How fo grow watermelon?
output: Plant watermelon seed na loose sandy gron, give dem bɔku sunlight, en water dem regular.

text_input: How fo protect orange tree from disease?
output: Prune di tree regular, use natural pesticide, en plant disease-resistant variety.

text_input: How fo know say di gron ready fo planting?
output: Di gron fo soft, rich inside organic matter, en nor fo hold too much wata.

text_input: How fo prepare land fo rice farming?
output: Clear di bush, level di gron, make small small canal dem fo drainage, en wait fo rain.

text_input: How fo store palm kernel?
output: Keep dem na dry, well-ventilated place, en nor store dem where e go get moisture.

text_input: How fo raise healthy pig dem?
output: Give dem clean wata, good shelter, en proper food like maize en cassava peel.

text_input: How fo protect pineapple from pest?
output: Use ash or neem spray, remove affected plant dem early, en plant dem wit enough spacing.

text_input: How fo know if mi chicken get disease?
output: If di chicken nor di eat, e eye dem red, e di weak, or e di get running nose, e fit sick.

text_input: How fo harvest cocoa?
output: Use sharp knife fo cut di ripe pod, open am careful, en dry di seed before storage.

text_input: How fo store maize fo long tem?
output: Dry di maize good, store inside sack, en keep am na place we air di blow fine.

text_input: How fo keep mi goat dem strong?
output: Give dem enough food, make sure dem get space fo waka, en give dem vaccination.
